column5: Hey all,  I got hooked on pier fishing for salmon last fall and ended up moving near longpoint - lake erie! I'm in town this weekend and am heading down to the credit from about 4 a.m. to 8 a.m.  Does anybody know if it's been crowding up yet?  Also, I'd love to have some company if anyone is interested!  I've got the long handled net and all necessary lures/spoons!  Cheers, UF
You won't have to worry about company; there already are plenty of people chucking spoons at Credit mouth.
Love to buddy,  But I have to sleep.

Sleep is for the weak Snag!  I usually fish those hours because my fiance can't complain that I'm not spending time with her and my daughter - sometimes I even make them breakfast when I get home to really butter up the situation! Keeps her happy and keeps me fishing!  Have a good one dude!  Ryan
Welcome back!  Hows' the new job working out
